prayerFocus.title: Strength in Weariness
prayerFocus.description: This week, let us lift up those who feel exhausted in their spirit. We pray for God's renewing strength to wash over every tired heart.

discussion.question: What is a recent challenge where you saw God's hand guiding you?
discussion.context: Sometimes we only see the path clearly when we look back.

announcements.title: New Audio Bible Added
announcements.content: We have updated the Bible section to include audio features. Check it out!

announcements.title: Weekend Fasting
announcements.content: Join us for a global day of fasting and prayer this coming Sunday.

announcements.title: Server Maintenance
announcements.content: The app might be slow for 1 hour on Friday night due to upgrades.
